Title: Relates to requiring landlords to allow for the estate of a deceased tenant to enter the property for sixty days following the death of the tenant
Summary: Requires landlords to allow for the estate of a deceased tenant to enter the property for sixty days following the death of the tenant.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to requiring landlords to allow for the estate of a deceased tenant to enter the property for sixty days following the death of the tenant
